titleStmt.title: Enochs walk and change opened in a sermon at Lawrence-Jury in London, Febr. 7th, 1655, at the funeral of the Reverend Mr. Richard Vines, minister of the Gospel there : with a short account of his life and death, with some elegies &c. on his death / by Tho. Jacombe ...
titleStmt.author: Jacombe, Thomas, 1622-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. and E.M. for Ralph Smith ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained and tightly bound, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
Includes bibliographical references in marginal notes.
